scripts.dev: npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run prisma:generate:schema && ts-node-dev --inspect --respawn --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.build: npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run prisma:generate:schema && npx tsc && npm run copy-templates
scripts.migrate:dev: npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run prisma:generate:schema && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:prod: npx dotenv -e .env.publish -- npm run prisma:generate:schema && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.studio: npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run prisma:generate:schema && npx prisma studio
